title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 29 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 29 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Speaker Pelosi orders her Praetorian Guard, the Capitol Police, to arrest House staff who break her new mask mandate. Clay: I would force Nancy Pelosi's police to arrest me. Where are the mask studies? On a baseline level, where is the effectiveness of this as a tool for controlling the pandemic? From the very early days, it was clear being vaccinated and wearing masks would become a political signifier. Liberals love having the power to decide who's "essential" and "nonessential." Surprising no one, the teachers union has reservations about opening schools. They destroyed the education system! Buck: We need to tell the libs to "go Fauci themselves."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
